text: Yeroo warri keeyyattoota keenyatti amanan sitti dhufan "Nageenyi isin irra haa jiraatuGooftaan keessan lubbuu Isaa irratti rahmata barreesseera: ‘namni isin irraa wallaalumaan hamtuu hojjatee ergasii isa booda gara Rabbii deebi’ee toltuu hojjate, dhugumatti Inni (isaaf) araaramaa, (isaaf) rahmata godhaa dha" (jedhi)
